mapper.select: select ordno, sku, dy_sku as dySku, name, num, price, picked, satisfied, uuid from l_manual_order_content where ordno = #{ordno}

select content.ordno, content.sku, content.dy_sku as dySku, content.name, content.num, content.price, content.picked, content.satisfied, content.uuid from l_manual_order_content content, l_manual_order ord where content.ordno = ord.ord_no and ord.category = #{category} and ord.status = #{status} order by ord.update_on desc
